about_the_game:
A special kind of a hacker game! As a computer virus you are infiltrating various servers and avoid their defense systems to reach the CPU. This is like a racing competition. Every progress gets you points. Your best score for each level will be saved in an online highscore list.
The highscore list is separated into 7 continents, 26 regions and 216 countries. You can see your ranking everytime for the respective location. Set your own goals! Do you want to be the best at your favorite level in your country, continent or even worldwide?

Besides the highscores for every level CYPEST also has a "Hacker-Olymp"! There all scores of a player are summed up for universal global highscore list. The game mechanices are child's play. The virus is flying upwards automatically, you'll only need to press left or right on the keyboard or gamepad. Easy to learn, hard to master. You can play the game with your friend on one PC. In each level you can also get up to four medals for your score.

CYPEST was originally developed as a freeware game and can still be played on the website of the game for free. It is running inside the browser and on Windows. The twenty freeware levels are 100% free.

CYPEST Underground is the further development. There are new missions with a total of 52 levels. The game is now more beginner friendly, but experienced players will also get a challenge. The medal system is completely new. There is new music, the two player mode was completely redesignet, new enemies and many small improvements. You can play the freeware and see if you like the gameplay. It is like an extensive demo.

You can not only see your accomplishements inside the game, but also on the CYPEST web page. You can also share them on every social network without hassle.

CYPEST Underground is 100% integrated into the Steam ecosystem. You don't have to register a new account. There will be achievements and many other things. During the first start of the game you'll need to set your location and can play immediately. Highscores from the freeware can not be carried over.

Privacy protection


We're only saving the data which is absolutely necessary, regardless of the freeware or Steam version. The game is only connecting to the server if one logs in or reaches a new highscore. The score will be saved into a database. We don't save how often you play. We will not know how many times you tried a level. There is no tracking code. Only the data is saved which is needed for your maximum gaming experience. The statistics you'll see inside the game will only be saved on your local machine.

Features


- easy controls via keyboard or gamepad
- 5 missions with 52 levels
- medal awards
- comprehensive online highscore lists
- an online profile for every player
- local two player mode
- local statistics
- colorful neon graphics

name: CYPEST Underground

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 560
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.2
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 670M
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.2

short_description: As a computer virus you are infiltrating various servers and avoid their defense systems to reach the CPU. Collect secret files and folders to land as high as possible in the highscore list.
